Christine Dixie (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ nà South Africa.

A mụrụ yá nà Cape Town, Dixie nwetara BFA ya na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand; mgbè nke a gasịrị ọ gàrà Mahadum Cape Town màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na-enweta ma nzere post-graduate ya na MFA ya site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1993

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, ma mepụta ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe. Ọrụ nrụnye ya nke afọ 2009 The Binding, nke nwéré ihe ọkpụkpụ isii, ebe ịchụàjà isii, etchings isii, na mbipụta dijitalụ abụọ, bụ nke National Museum of African Art zụrụ na 2010. Ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ahụ nwekwara mbipụta nke 2000 mezzotint Hide: to contain or retirement from sight, ya 2001 ọrụ Unravel, na ya 2007 Even in the Long Descent I-V A pụkwara ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke New York Public Library, Johannesburg Art Museum, na Isiko National Art Museum. Dixie akụziwo na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown n'oge ọrụ ya. N'afọ 2012, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà iri na ise nyèrè onyinye Artist Research Fellowship site na Smithsonian Institution. Ọrụ ya, nke akpọrọ The Heroic Explorer and Angelic Girl, lekwasịrị anya na ụdị nwoke na nwanyị nke narị afọ nke irí na itoolu ma jiri ihe na National Portrait Gallery na Museum of American History.
Bevan de Wet, ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ na Johannesburg, bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya.
